<<<<<<< HEAD
A souldiers vvishe to Britons welfare: or a discourse, fit to be read of all gentlemen and souldiers. Written by a Captaine of experience Rich, Barnabe, 1540?-1617.
[6], 76 p.
[By T. Creed] for Ieffrey Chorlton, and are to be sold at the great North dore of Saint Paules, Imprinted at London : 1604.
Printer's name from STC. Dedication signed: Barnabie Riche. A dialogue between captains Pill and Skill--STC. Running title reads: Captaine Skill, and Captaine Pill. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
=======

Printer's name from STC. Dedication signed: Barnabie Riche. A dialogue between captains Pill and Skill--STC. Running title reads: Captaine Skill, and Captaine Pill. Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
